1) Always keep your left thumb on the vertical bar.
2) Then touch the horizontal bar with your right thumb.
3) Slide your right thumb left and right to create sounds.

Good luck, and don't forget to check out the menu for sound effects!

"The theremin is an early electronic musical instrument controlled without discernible physical contact from the player. It is named after its Russian inventor, Professor Léon Theremin, who patented the device in 1928." \n\n- from Wikipedia
The Pocket Theremin was created by Carl Thomé as a homework assignment at KTH Royal Institute of Technology.
